tool.name: BED to BAM

param.label: Convert the following BED file to BAM
param.name: input

param.help: If Selected, bedToBam will convert blocked BED features (e.g., gene annotaions) into 'spliced' BAM alignments by creating an appropriate CIGAR string. (-bed12)
param.label: Indicate that the input BED file is in BED12 (a.k.a 'blocked' BED) format
param.name: bed12

param.label: Set a mapping quality (SAM MAPQ field) value for all BED entries
param.name: mapq
